brief_title: Fluzoparib in Combination With Chidamide or Camrelizumab for HRD Positive HER2 Negative Advanced Breast Cancer
brief_summary: This study is planned to include 40 patients with HER2-negative advanced breast cancer to receive fluzoparib combined with chidamide or fluzoparib combined with camrelizumab to observe and evaluate the efficacy and safety of fluzoparib combined with camrelizumab or chidamide in the treatment of HRD-positive HER2-negative advanced breast cancer.
